Html:
Would it be possibble to remove the ListExtensions.cs? Because I have a Project where I use the Full Net 4.0 Profile (Sharp Develop), wich uses the LINQ Methods First and Last at many Places, and so I got a Namespace conflict!

I see, that the only use of this class is in SelectionMultiple.cs.
And at the Place where this is done, the Count is checked bevor so you can replace treeViewEx.SelectedItems.First() with treeViewEx.SelectedItems[0] without any problems!

Would be nice!
It also would be nice if you could Sign the Assembly!
Is fixed with changeSet 72267. Thanks for the hints.
